comment:
* A request object for generating conversation action suggestions.
     *
     * @see TextClassifier#suggestConversationActions(Request)

variables.name: HINT_FOR_IN_APP
variables.comment: * To indicate the generated actions will be used within the app.

variables.name: HINT_FOR_NOTIFICATION
variables.comment: * To indicate the generated actions will be used for notification.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
public List<Message> getConversation()
methods.comment: Returns an immutable list of messages that make up the conversation.

methods.name: public int getMaxSuggestions()
methods.comment:
* Return the maximal number of suggestions the caller wants, value -1 means no restriction
         * and this is the default.

methods.name: public List<String> getHints()
methods.comment: Returns an immutable list of hints

methods.name: public String getCallingPackageName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the name of the package that sent this request.
         * This returns {@code null} if no calling package name is set.

methods.name: void setSystemTextClassifierMetadata(@Nullable SystemTextClassifierMetadata systemTcData)
methods.comment:
* Sets the information about the {@link SystemTextClassifier} that sent this request.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public SystemTextClassifierMetadata getSystemTextClassifierMetadata()
methods.comment:
* Returns the information about the {@link SystemTextClassifier} that sent this request.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment:
* Returns the extended data related to this request. * *

NOTE: Do not modify this bundle.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
